name: zkCross Network
description: Introduction to zkCross Network Truly decentralised cross-chain interoperability protocol and DeFi Infrastructure-as-a-Service provider that automates complex DeFi interactions like swapping & bridging, making cross-chain transactions easy and accessible for all users. Like Visa and Mastercard revolutionised the use of fiat by simplifying complex financial transactions, zkCross Network is transforming how you transact in DeFi by completely stripping away & automating the complexities to make DeFi as straightforward and user-friendly as using your bank card. The Vision Behind zkCross Network zkCross Network is driven by a vision to create a unified value layer that facilitates optimised value movement across the entire Web3 spectrum, encompassing blockchains, DeFi protocols, and decentralised applications (DApps). We aim to empower users with one-click solutions that make interacting with DeFi as straightforward as TradFi (traditional finance). Our vision is a cohesive DeFi ecosystem by developing and deploying DeFi infrastructure across all major EVM and non-EVM chains, allowing for the free flow of liquidity and assets across all blockchains. We believe the full potential of DeFi will be realised when liquidity and assets can seamlessly traverse the entire Web3 landscape without current technological or operational barriers. At zkCross Network we are creating solutions that bolster blockchain interoperability and significantly enhance user experience across Web3. Through the zkCross Protocol and the deployment of zkCrossDEXs on all major blockchains, we aim to foster a more inclusive, efficient, and secure DeFi environment with seamless liquidity and asset flow irrespective of the token standard.
